The user creates a [[wikipedia:whip|whip]] made of water that can wrap around the opponent. The user can also [[Lightning Release: Electromagnetic Murder|channel]] [[lightning]] [[chakra]] to shock anyone wrapped in it. This technique seems to be known by the [[Kirigakure]] [[hunter-nin]].<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 146</ref> It's also strong enough to completely counter [[Yamato]]'s [[Wood Release]].<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 147</ref>
